hero.title: Welcome to Kamungo Lodge

about.title: About Us
about.description:
Our village is located near Iquitos, deep in the heart of the Amazon rainforest, where the river meets the jungle and life flows with nature.

We are an indigenous community that has lived in harmony with this land for generations. Through fishing, handcrafting, and sustainable living, we preserve our ancestral knowledge and traditions.

The name Kamungo Lodge comes from the Kamungo bird — a beautiful and rare species native to this region. Just like the Kamungo, our community thrives in the richness of the rainforest, surrounded by the sounds, colors, and rhythms of the Amazon.

We warmly welcome visitors who wish to experience authentic jungle life, learn from our culture, and reconnect with nature.
